data.description: Updates the remote ip for proxied requests
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a function that is needed for people running mod_perl
    server behind a proxy server, for performance reasons, and want the
    mod_perl server to perform IP-based authentications. There exist
    Apache modules but this is an all-Perl solution using mod_perl's
    features.
